founding, running @LongCovidGroup 
and recruiting good people to work with you.
Here's to an effective treatment for #LongCovid

In the early months of the #pandemic, these #women were often not believed, and for those who did present to a physician, the range of #LongCOVID symptoms and lack of diagnostic criteria has made it difficult for them to get answers.
Estimates range from 60% to 80% of all reported casesâ€”affecting not only #WomensHealth, but also their ability to fully participate in everyday life, work and care for loved ones.

In doing so, Susie has amplified the voices of long-haulers, especially #women. A survey conducted in May 2021 by @VINExploration, @LongCovidGroup and @MyBrainMatters found that women in their middle years are disproportionately impacted by #LongCOVID.
